mapper.select: select t_actor.actor_name as name, t2.num as num from (SELECT count(*) AS num, actor_id from t_movie_actor join t_movie_director tmd on t_movie_actor.movie_id = tmd.movie_id join t_director td on (tmd.director_id = td.director_id AND td.director_name = #{directorName}) group by actor_id order by num desc limit 10) t2, t_actor where t2.actor_id = t_actor.actor_id

select t2.num as num, t_actor.actor_name as name from (select count(*) as num, t2.actor_id as actor_id from t_movie_actor t1 join t_actor ta on t1.actor_id = ta.actor_id and ta.actor_name = #{actorName} join t_movie_actor t2 on t1.movie_id = t2.movie_id group by t2.actor_id order by num desc limit 10) t2, t_actor where t_actor.actor_id = t2.actor_id

select t_director.director_name as name, t2.num as num from (SELECT count(*) AS num, director_id from t_movie_director tmd join t_movie_actor tma on tma.movie_id = tmd.movie_id join t_actor ta on (tma.actor_id = ta.actor_id AND ta.actor_name = #{actorName}) group by director_id order by num desc limit 10) t2, t_director where t2.director_id = t_director.director_id
